## Purpose
Helper icon set depicting Claude branding for in-app references.

## Key Views/ViewModels/Services/Models
- `Contents.json` and `claude.svg` capture the vector glyph.

## Data Flow & Interfaces
Used in views that display available LLM providers.

## Dependencies
SwiftUI `Image` and rendering pipeline.

## Refactor Opportunities
Convert to PDF or SF Symbol if the provider branding updates.

Reviewed files: 2
